headerDisplay: This plugin maps Shelly Plus RGBW PM devices to Homebridge accessories, supporting RGBW/RGB light mode or up to four independent dimmer channels.
footerDisplay: For help or in case of issues please visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Krillle/homebridge-shelly-plus-rgbw-pm/issues).

devices.title: Shelly Devices
devices.description: Add one or more Shelly Plus RGBW PM devices.

name.title: Device Name
name.description: Name you want to see for this device in Homebridge.

host.title: IP Address or mDNS Name
host.description: The mDNS name is persistent, even in a DHCP-based IP environment. You can find the device’s ID at http://<device-ip-address>/shelly (field "id"). Append .local to this ID to obtain the mDNS hostname.

showDimmer4.title: Show Dimmer O4
showDimmer4.description: For Shelly Plus RGBW PM devices in light mode, select the dimmers you want to see as devices in Homebridge. If the device is in RGBW or RGB mode, these checkboxes are ignored.
